scripts.deploy: cd themes && git submodule update --init --recursive && cd ../ && cp -f ./themes/modified/source/css/_variables.styl ./themes/landscape-plus/source/css/_variables.styl && cp -f ./themes/modified/layout/_partial/after-footer.ejs ./themes/landscape-plus/layout/_partial/after-footer.ejs && cp -f ./themes/modified/layout/_partial/article.ejs ./themes/landscape-plus/layout/_partial/article.ejs && cp -f ./themes/modified/layout/_partial/head.ejs ./themes/landscape-plus/layout/_partial/head.ejs && hexo generate && hexo deploy
